sampleBoard.name: Sample Pedalboard Configuration
sampleBoard.description: A comprehensive guitar effects chain featuring tuning, boost, compression, overdrive, distortion, chorus, delay, reverb and amp

signalChain.description: Compact polyphonic tuner with chromatic and strobe tuning modes
features: Polyphonic tuning - tune all strings at once
Ultra-precise strobe tuner with ±0.02 cent accuracy
Bonafide Buffer circuit maintains signal integrity
109 LED display with automatic brightness adjustment
Always-On mode for continuous tuning monitoring
signalChain.dimensions: 51mm x 93mm x 45mm (W x D x H)
signalChain.notes: Industry standard polyphonic tuner, essential first pedal in any chain. Features premium Bonafide Buffer for signal integrity.

signalChain.description: Transparent 20dB+ clean boost with 2-band active EQ
signalChain.dimensions: 112mm x 60mm x 50mm (W x D x H)
signalChain.notes: Legendary clean boost by Scott Henderson. Often left on permanently to enhance tone without coloring the signal.

signalChain.description: Versatile compressor with clean blend for transparent compression
features: Clean blend control for parallel compression
Full range from subtle to heavy compression
signalChain.dimensions: 89mm x 114mm x 38mm (W x D x H)
signalChain.notes: Modern classic compressor, widely regarded as industry standard. Perfect for both subtle dynamics control and country squash.

signalChain.description: Custom boost circuit designed to capture classic Texas blues tone
features: Designed for SRV-style Texas blues tones
Glassy clean-up when rolling back guitar volume
controls: 3-way frequency switch (Hi: Glass/Bite, Mid: Fat/Tube, Lo: Growl/Wood)
signalChain.notes: Boutique pedal specifically tuned for Stevie Ray Vaughan style Texas blues. Inspired by the Cesar Diaz Texas Ranger circuit.

signalChain.description: Dual-stage transparent overdrive with responsive tone controls
features: Dual clipping stages for amp-like overdrive
External DIP switches for tonal adjustments
RGB LED (can be set to any color)
signalChain.notes: Premium transparent overdrive with exceptional build quality. Perfect complement to other drive pedals with no low-frequency loss.

signalChain.description: Legendary tube screamer overdrive with warm, natural tone
features: Analog circuitry faithful to vintage specs
signalChain.dimensions: 70mm x 125mm x 55mm (W x D x H)
signalChain.notes: Most copied and studied overdrive pedal in history. Essential blues/rock tone made famous by Stevie Ray Vaughan.

signalChain.description: Amp-like overdrive with organic tone and touch sensitivity
features: Guitar volume cleanup like tube amp
Wide gain range from clean boost to overdrive
Multi-stage clipping circuit inspired by tube amps
signalChain.dimensions: 73mm x 129mm x 59mm (W x D x H)
signalChain.notes: Beloved overdrive since 1995, known for exceptional dynamics and tube-like response. Wide gain range supports various applications.

signalChain.description: Simple one-knob clean boost with up to 26dB of gain
features: Can be used as buffer when on
Excellent for pushing amps or other pedals
signalChain.dimensions: 60mm x 111mm x 32mm (W x D x H)
signalChain.notes: Classic utility pedal, essential for signal boosting and level matching. The gold standard for simple, effective clean boost.

signalChain.description: Classic Boss chorus with stereo output capability
features: Effect level control for wet/dry mix
signalChain.dimensions: 73mm x 129mm x 59mm (W x D x H)
signalChain.notes: Industry standard chorus pedal based on Roland JC-120. Perfect for 80s tones and clean enhancement with unique stereo capabilities.

signalChain.description: High-quality delay pedal with multiple delay types and TonePrint technology
features: Multiple delay types (Digital, Analog, Tape, Ethereal, etc.)
signalChain.dimensions: 72mm x 122mm x 50mm (W x D x H)
signalChain.notes: Professional delay pedal with advanced MASH technology and TonePrint customization. Based on TC's legendary 2290 delay heritage.

signalChain.description: Compact digital reverb with 11 different reverb algorithms
features: 11 reverb types (Hall, Spring, Plate, Reverse, Echo, etc.)
Secondary knob functions for advanced control
Tails switch for reverb decay control
External footswitch input for infinite function
signalChain.notes: Versatile reverb pedal with extensive range from essential to exotic reverb types. Includes power supply and offers tremendous value.

signalChain.description: Faithful recreation of Fender 6G15 spring reverb in pedal format
features: JFET transistors replace tubes for reliability
signalChain.notes: Premium analog spring reverb, the Holy Grail for surf and vintage enthusiasts. Authentic 6G15 circuit with modern reliability.

signalChain.description: The final destination for the processed guitar signal
features: Final tone shaping through preamp and power amp stages
Interaction with all preceding effects in the chain
signalChain.notes: Guitar amplifier completes the signal chain, where the processed effects are amplified and heard. Choice of amp greatly influences final tone.
